text: Jonathan Michael Graham Ashworth (born 14 October 1978) is a British Labour and Co-operative Party politician. He was a Member of Parliament for Leicester South from 2011 to 2024. He was also the Shadow Secretary of State for Health and Social Care. He worked as an adviser to Gordon Brown and head of party relations for Ed Miliband. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Politicians from Greater Manchester
title: Jonathan Ashworth
